creator: nick@linicks.net
text:
System is currently in timezone BST (UTC+1), but apache 2.5.0-dev is stuck on:

Server Built: Apr 29 2016 08:16:33 

Current Time: Friday, 29-Apr-2016 10:49:38 UTC

Restart Time: Friday, 29-Apr-2016 10:39:41 UTC

2.4.xx recognized daylight savings OK.

Is this a bug or is it me?
